text: Foundation stone was laid for the combined court buildings and judicial officers’ quarters at a cost of Rs. 36 crore here on Saturday. Justice T. Raja of the Madras High Court laid the stones in Thadangam village. The court building is to be constructed at Rs. 23.50 crore while the quarters would come up at Rs. 5.76 crore on the 18-acre court premises.
title: Stone laid
